description: Provide real-time insights and analytics on gaming trends to help users stay updated with the latest developments in the gaming industry. Enable data-driven decisions by exposing relevant game trend data and metrics through a standardized interface. Facilitate integration with other tools and applications for enhanced gaming market analysis.

capabilities.name: get_steam_trending_games
capabilities.description: Get real trending games from Steam platform with live data from multiple sources.

capabilities.name: get_steam_top_sellers
capabilities.description: Get real top selling games from Steam platform with live sales data.

capabilities.name: get_steam_most_played
capabilities.description: Get real-time most played games from Steam with live player statistics from SteamCharts.

capabilities.name: get_epic_free_games
capabilities.description: Get current and upcoming free games from Epic Games Store with real promotion data.

capabilities.name: get_epic_trending_games
capabilities.description: Get trending games from Epic Games Store.

capabilities.name: get_all_trending_games
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive real-time gaming data from all platforms (Steam and Epic Games).

capabilities.name: get_api_health
capabilities.description: Check the health status of the Gaming Trend Analytics API.
